properties.areaDesc: Mexico Bay NY to the St. Lawrence River; Hamlin Beach to Sodus Bay NY; Sodus Bay to Mexico Bay NY
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 7 at 9:26PM EST until January 8 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds to 35 knots and waves
10 to 13 feet expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, west
winds to 30 knots and waves 5 to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from Hamlin Beach
to the Saint Lawrence River.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 10 AM to 9 PM EST Wednesday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 9 PM EST WEDNESDAY
